head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MURPHY, JOSEPH J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MURPHY, JOSEPH J.

block.p: MURPHY-Joseph J., of Naples, Fl on September 25, 2000 after a brief illness. Devoted husband of Mary Elizabeth. Loving father of Dennis J., Janet Murphy Simon, and Jeffrey J. Beloved grandfather of five grandchildren. Youngest of seven children of John Jeffrey Murphy and Esther Kelly of South Orange, NJ. Mass Saturday, 9:30 a.m., Our Lady of Sorrows Church, South Orange. Interment private.
